headline: Ecolab Inc. (ECL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Ecolab Inc. on The Buyside Guy’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ECL. Ecolab Inc.’s share was trading at $264.28 as of August 4th. ECL’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.89 and 34.72, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Ecolab (ECL) is a $60B+ global leader […]
